tooltip_tab_transcription: Configure the primary transcription service (API, model, language, etc.).
tooltip_tab_rephrase: Configure automatic rephrasing or prompting of your transcribed text using a secondary AI model.
tooltip_tab_transformations: Define custom prompts for manual, selection-based rephrasing/transformations.
tooltip_tab_general: General application settings like UI language, logging options, etc.
api_key_tooltip: Your API key for the selected service (e.g., OpenAI or Groq).
api_endpoint_tooltip: The endpoint URL of the API for the transcription service.
model_tooltip: The specific AI model to use for transcription.
temperature_tooltip: Controls randomness. Lower values (e.g., 0.0) make the output more deterministic. Higher values make it more creative.
hotkey_tooltip: The key combination to press to start/stop recording.
input_language_tooltip: 'Detect Language' may work, but specifying the language is more accurate.
gain_tooltip: Increases the volume of your microphone if you are too quiet. 0 dB is no change. Positive values amplify.
transcription_prompt_tooltip: Provide hints to the AI to improve accuracy for specific words, names, or formatting.
liveprompt_enable_tooltip: Enables or disables the LivePrompting feature.
liveprompt_help_tooltip:
LivePrompting allows you to give direct instructions to the AI.
If your recording starts with a trigger word (e.g., 'prompt'), the entire transcription will be treated
as a command for the AI to execute, using the 'LivePrompting System Prompt'.
This is useful for tasks like summarizing, translating, or reformatting text on the fly.
liveprompt_help_button_tooltip: Click to show a detailed explanation of the LivePrompting feature.
liveprompt_trigger_words_tooltip:
If one of these words (case-insensitive) appears at the start of your transcription,
the 'LivePrompting' system prompt will be used to rephrase the text.
Useful for direct instructions to the AI.
liveprompt_trigger_scan_depth_tooltip:
Only check for trigger words within the first X words of the transcription.
This prevents accidental triggers later in the text.
liveprompt_system_prompt_tooltip:
The system instruction sent to the AI when a trigger word is detected.
The transcription itself is used as the user input.
generic_rephrase_enable_checkbox: Enable Generic Rephrasing (if liveprompting disabled OR no trigger word is found)
generic_rephrase_prompt_tooltip: The instruction for the AI on a generic rephrase (e.g., 'Make this more polite').
shared_api_group_tooltip: These API settings are used for all rephrasing and LivePrompting operations.
rephrase_context_checkbox: Use selected text as context when using LivePrompting via trigger word
rephrase_context_tooltip:
If checked, any text you have selected on screen will be automatically added
as context to the prompt when a trigger word is used.
test_api_button_tooltip: Sends a simple request to verify the API settings.
api_test_unexpected_response_text:
The API returned an unexpected response:

{response}
api_test_exception_text:
An error occurred during the API test:

{error}
rephrase_api_settings_missing: Please fill in all API settings (URL, Key, Model) before testing.
transformations_info: Define up to {max_entries} rephrasing prompts for post-processing transcriptions.
restore_clipboard_checkbox: Restore clipboard after use (If disabled: Will copy the transcript to the clipboard)
debug_logging_checkbox: Enable debug logging (more details in log)
file_logging_checkbox: Write log file to application folder (WhisperTyper.log)
play_last_recording_tooltip: Plays the last recording with the default system player
transcription_failed_message: Transcription failed. See dialog for details.
validation_warning_text: There seem to be issues with your settings (warnings only / will still save):
quit_dialog_text: Are you sure you want to quit?
post_rephrase_hotkey_label: Hotkey to show post-rephrase options for selected text:
post_rephrase_hotkey_tooltip: Press this hotkey when text is selected to show a menu with your custom transformations.
about_dialog_text:
WhisperTyper

A simple tool to transcribe your voice to text and rephrase it using various AI models.
transformations_tab_description:
Here you can define custom text transformations.
When you press the configured hotkey with text selected, a menu with your defined captions will appear.
Clicking a button will rephrase the selected text using the corresponding prompt.
This feature uses the 'Shared API Settings' from the 'Rephrasing' tab.
systray_double_click_copy_checkbox: Enable double click on SysTray to copy transcript
macos_accessibility_text:
WhisperTyper needs permission to monitor keyboard input for global hotkeys.
Please go to System Settings > Privacy & Security > Accessibility and enable it for this application.
The app might need to be restarted.
macos_microphone_text:
WhisperTyper needs permission to access your microphone for recording.
Please go to System Settings > Privacy & Security > Microphone and enable it for this application.
The app might need to be restarted.
macos_hotkey_text: On macOS, hotkeys cannot be captured automatically. Please enter the desired key combination manually into the text field (e.g., `<cmd>+<shift>+f`).
macos_hotkey_restart_text: The hotkey has been changed. Please restart the application for the new hotkey to become active.
rephrasing_finished_macos_message: Rephrasing complete. Text copied to clipboard.
alt_clipboard_lib_checkbox: Use alternative library for Copy/Paste (Better compatibility on macOS)
alt_clipboard_lib_tooltip: If copy/paste actions are unreliable, this library (pyautogui) might work better. It's a common workaround for macOS compatibility issues.
recording_no_api_keys: Cannot start recording: API Key or Endpoint is not set.
